title: Can you explain the metaphysical world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Meta means small details… some would say insignificant data. Physical means anything that is composed of matter… doesn’t mean it takes up space, but definitely makes up space! So metaphysical world means small details about life! And when you study the metaphysical world you see that all life comes from darkness! So metaphysically speaking the sun is actually a Dark hole, which is fusing together Hydrogen atoms to form Helium… which gives us radiation! Physically, the sun is a big ball of fire which give us light and head!

pertaining to or of the nature ofmetaphysics. 2. Philosophy. concerned with abstract thought or subjects, as existence, causality, or truth. concerned with first principles and ultimate grounds, as being, time, or substance. So IMO more made up human rubbish Strangle babble to seem intelligent explaining nothing proving nothing because its an idea about nonsense
